metadata.title: CVE-2019-10172 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in org.codehaus.jackson:jackson-mapper-asl:1.9.xlibraries. XML external entity vulnerabilities similar CVE-2016-3720 alsoaffects codehaus jackson-mapper-asl libraries but in different classes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson-json-java - 1.9.2-7ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjackson-json-java package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-7ubuntu0.2').
